columns.name: id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the account in the CRM database.

columns.name: masterrecordid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the master account record associated with this account.

columns.name: name
columns.sfdc_description: The name or descriptive label for the account.

columns.name: type
columns.sfdc_description: The type of the account, such as "Customer - Direct".

columns.name: recordtypeid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the record type associated with the account.

columns.name: parentid
columns.sfdc_description: The ID of the parent account associated with this account.

columns.name: billingstreet
columns.sfdc_description: The billing street address of the account.

columns.name: billingcity
columns.sfdc_description: The city associated with the account's billing address.

columns.name: billingstate
columns.sfdc_description: The state associated with the account's billing address.

columns.name: billingpostalcode
columns.sfdc_description: The postal code associated with the account's billing address.

columns.name: billingcountry
columns.sfdc_description: The country associated with the account's billing address.

columns.name: billinglatitude
columns.sfdc_description: The latitude coordinate associated with the account's billing address.

columns.name: billinglongitude
columns.sfdc_description: The longitude coordinate of the account's billing address.

columns.name: shippingstreet
columns.sfdc_description: The shipping address for the account.

columns.name: shippingcity
columns.sfdc_description: The city where shipments for the account are delivered.

columns.name: shippingstate
columns.sfdc_description: The state of the shipping address associated with the account.

columns.name: shippingpostalcode
columns.sfdc_description: The postal code for the account's shipping address.

columns.name: shippingcountry
columns.sfdc_description: The country where shipments for the account are sent.

columns.name: shippinglatitude
columns.sfdc_description: The latitude coordinate for the account's shipping address.

columns.name: shippinglongitude
columns.sfdc_description: The longitude coordinate of the account's shipping address.

columns.name: shippinggeocodeaccuracy
columns.sfdc_description: The accuracy level of the account's shipping address geocode.

columns.name: phone
columns.sfdc_description: The phone number associated with the account.

columns.name: fax
columns.sfdc_description: The fax number associated with the account.

columns.name: website
columns.sfdc_description: The website of the account.

columns.name: industry
columns.sfdc_description: The industry category associated with the account.

columns.name: annualrevenue
columns.sfdc_description: The annual revenue of the account.

columns.name: numberofemployees
columns.sfdc_description: The number of employees associated with the account.

columns.name: description
columns.sfdc_description: A text field for additional details about the account.

columns.name: ownerid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the owner assigned to the account.

columns.name: createddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the account was created.

columns.name: createdbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who created the account.

columns.name: lastmodifieddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the account record was last modified.

columns.name: lastmodifiedbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who last modified the account.

columns.name: lastactivitydate
columns.sfdc_description: The date of the last recorded activity for the account.

columns.name: lastvieweddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the account was last viewed.

columns.name: lastreferenceddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the account was last referenced.

columns.name: accountsource
columns.sfdc_description: The origin or channel through which the account was acquired.

columns.name: systemmodstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The system-generated timestamp indicating when the account record was last modified.

columns.name: recordstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp indicating when the account record was created or last modified.

columns.name: billinggeocodeaccuracy
columns.sfdc_description: The accuracy of the billing geocode for the account.

columns.name: accountnumber
columns.sfdc_description: The unique number used to identify an account.

columns.name: photourl
columns.sfdc_description: The URL path to the photo associated with the account.

columns.name: rating
columns.sfdc_description: The rating of the account used to categorize its priority or quality.

columns.name: site
columns.sfdc_description: The site associated with the account.

columns.name: currencyisocode
columns.sfdc_description: The ISO currency code associated with the account.

columns.name: jigsaw
columns.sfdc_description: The Jigsaw (ZoomInfo) identifier associated with the account.

columns.name: jigsawcompanyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the account in the Jigsaw business data platform.

columns.name: sicdesc
columns.sfdc_description: The Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) industry description for the account.

columns.name: id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for each case record.

columns.name: masterrecordid
columns.sfdc_description: The ID of the master record associated with the case.

columns.name: casenumber
columns.sfdc_description: The unique 8-digit identifier for a case, formatted with leading zeros.

columns.name: contactid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the contact associated with the case.

columns.name: accountid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the case.

columns.name: entitlementid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the entitlement associated with the case.

columns.name: parentid
columns.sfdc_description: The ID of the parent case that this case is associated with.

columns.name: suppliedname
columns.sfdc_description: The name supplied by the case reporter.

columns.name: suppliedemail
columns.sfdc_description: The email address supplied by the individual associated with the case.

columns.name: suppliedphone
columns.sfdc_description: The phone number supplied for the case.

columns.name: suppliedcompany
columns.sfdc_description: The company supplied in relation to the case.

columns.name: type
columns.sfdc_description: The category of the case, such as Problem or Feature Request.

columns.name: recordtypeid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the type of case record.

columns.name: status
columns.sfdc_description: The current status of the case.

columns.name: reason
columns.sfdc_description: The reason for the case.

columns.name: origin
columns.sfdc_description: The channel from which the case originated.

columns.name: language
columns.sfdc_description: The language associated with the case.

columns.name: subject
columns.sfdc_description: The brief summary of the topic or event the case pertains to.

columns.name: priority
columns.sfdc_description: The priority level assigned to the case.

columns.name: description
columns.sfdc_description: The detailed description of the case.

columns.name: isclosed
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the case is closed.

columns.name: closeddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the case was closed.

columns.name: isescalated
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the case has been escalated.

columns.name: ownerid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user assigned as the owner of the case.

columns.name: slastartdate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the case's Service Level Agreement (SLA) started.

columns.name: slaexitdate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the case's Service Level Agreement (SLA) ends.

columns.name: createddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the case was created.

columns.name: createdbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who created the case.

columns.name: lastmodifieddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time the case was last modified.

columns.name: lastmodifiedbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who last modified the case.

columns.name: systemmodstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the case record was last modified by the system.

columns.name: contactphone
columns.sfdc_description: The phone number of the contact associated with the case.

columns.name: contactmobile
columns.sfdc_description: The mobile phone number of the contact associated with the case.

columns.name: contactemail
columns.sfdc_description: The email address of the contact associated with the case.

columns.name: contactfax
columns.sfdc_description: The fax number of the contact associated with the case.

columns.name: comments
columns.sfdc_description: Comments or notes associated with the case.

columns.name: lastvieweddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the case was last viewed.

columns.name: lastreferenceddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the case was last referenced.

columns.name: recordstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the case record was created or last updated.

columns.name: currencyisocode
columns.sfdc_description: The ISO currency code associated with the case.

columns.name: owner_type
columns.sfdc_description: The type of owner of the case.

columns.name: id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for a case history record.

columns.name: isdeleted
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the case history record has been deleted.

columns.name: caseid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the case associated with the history entry.

columns.name: createdbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who created the case history entry.

columns.name: createddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time the case history entry was created.

columns.name: field
columns.sfdc_description: The type of entity the case history entry relates to.

columns.name: datatype
columns.sfdc_description: The type of data associated with a case history entry.

columns.name: oldvalue
columns.sfdc_description: The previous value of a modified field in a case history record.

columns.name: newvalue
columns.sfdc_description: The new case assignee's name or ID

columns.name: id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for a contact in the CRM.

columns.name: masterrecordid
columns.sfdc_description: The ID of the master contact record this contact is linked to for deduplication or merging purposes.

columns.name: accountid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the contact.

columns.name: lastname
columns.sfdc_description: The last name of the contact.

columns.name: firstname
columns.sfdc_description: The first name of the contact.

columns.name: salutation
columns.sfdc_description: The salutation used to address the contact.

columns.name: name
columns.sfdc_description: The name of the contact (may be a full name, first name, or nickname).

columns.name: recordtypeid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the type of contact record.

columns.name: otherstreet
columns.sfdc_description: An additional street address for the contact.

columns.name: othercity
columns.sfdc_description: An additional city associated with the contact.

columns.name: otherstate
columns.sfdc_description: The additional state information associated with the contact.

columns.name: otherpostalcode
columns.sfdc_description: An additional postal code associated with the contact.

columns.name: othercountry
columns.sfdc_description: An additional country associated with the contact.

columns.name: otherlatitude
columns.sfdc_description: The alternative latitude coordinate associated with the contact.

columns.name: otherlongitude
columns.sfdc_description: The secondary geographic longitude coordinate associated with the contact.

columns.name: othergeocodeaccuracy
columns.sfdc_description: Additional information about the accuracy of the contact's geocoded location.

columns.name: mailingstreet
columns.sfdc_description: The street address line for the contact's mailing address.

columns.name: mailingcity
columns.sfdc_description: The city of the contact's mailing address.

columns.name: mailingstate
columns.sfdc_description: The state associated with the contact's mailing address.

columns.name: mailingpostalcode
columns.sfdc_description: The postal code for the contact's mailing address.

columns.name: mailingcountry
columns.sfdc_description: The mailing country of the contact.

columns.name: mailinglatitude
columns.sfdc_description: The north-south geographic coordinate of the contact's mailing address.

columns.name: mailinglongitude
columns.sfdc_description: The longitude coordinate of the contact's mailing address.

columns.name: mailinggeocodeaccuracy
columns.sfdc_description: The accuracy level of the geocode associated with the contact's mailing address.

columns.name: phone
columns.sfdc_description: The phone number of the contact.

columns.name: fax
columns.sfdc_description: The fax number associated with the contact.

columns.name: mobilephone
columns.sfdc_description: The mobile phone number of the contact.

columns.name: homephone
columns.sfdc_description: The home telephone number of the contact.

columns.name: otherphone
columns.sfdc_description: An additional phone number for the contact.

columns.name: assistantphone
columns.sfdc_description: The phone number of the contact's assistant.

columns.name: reportstoid
columns.sfdc_description: The ID of the contact that this contact reports to.

columns.name: email
columns.sfdc_description: The email address associated with the contact.

columns.name: title
columns.sfdc_description: The honorific title of the contact (e.g., Mr., Ms., Dr.).

columns.name: department
columns.sfdc_description: The department of the contact's organization.

columns.name: assistantname
columns.sfdc_description: The name of the assistant associated with the contact.

columns.name: leadsource
columns.sfdc_description: The source from which the contact was acquired as a lead.

columns.name: birthdate
columns.sfdc_description: The date of birth of the contact.

columns.name: description
columns.sfdc_description: Additional notes or details about the contact.

columns.name: ownerid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who owns the contact.

columns.name: createddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the contact record was created.

columns.name: createdbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who created the contact record.

columns.name: lastmodifieddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp of when the contact record was last modified.

columns.name: lastmodifiedbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who last modified the contact record.

columns.name: systemmodstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the contact record was last modified by the system.

columns.name: lastactivitydate
columns.sfdc_description: The date of the most recent activity associated with the contact.

columns.name: lastcurequestdate
columns.sfdc_description: The last customer request date of the contact.

columns.name: lastcuupdatedate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the contact record was last updated.

columns.name: lastvieweddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time the contact was last viewed.

columns.name: lastreferenceddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the contact record was last referenced.

columns.name: emailbouncedreason
columns.sfdc_description: The reason why an email sent to the contact bounced.

columns.name: emailbounceddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the contact's email address resulted in a bounce.

columns.name: isemailbounced
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the contact's email has bounced.

columns.name: photourl
columns.sfdc_description: The URL of the contact's photo.

columns.name: jigsaw
columns.sfdc_description: The Jigsaw identifier associated with the contact.

columns.name: jigsawcontactid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the contact in the Jigsaw database.

columns.name: individualid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the individual associated with the contact.

columns.name: recordstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp indicating when the contact record was created or last modified.

columns.name: currencyisocode
columns.sfdc_description: The ISO currency code associated with the contact.

columns.name: ispriorityrecord
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the contact is marked as a priority record.

columns.name: id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for a currency type record.

columns.name: isocode
columns.sfdc_description: The ISO currency code representing the type of currency.

columns.name: conversionrate
columns.sfdc_description: The conversion rate of the currency type relative to a base currency.

columns.name: decimalplaces
columns.sfdc_description: The number of decimal places used for the currency type.

columns.name: isactive
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the currency type is active.

columns.name: iscorporate
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the currency type is designated for corporate use.

columns.name: createddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the currency type record was created.

columns.name: createdbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who created the currency type record.

columns.name: lastmodifieddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the currency type record was last modified.

columns.name: lastmodifiedbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who last modified the currency type record.

columns.name: systemmodstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the currency type record was last modified by the system.

columns.name: recordstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the currency type record was created or last modified.

columns.name: id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for each dated conversion rate record.

columns.name: isocode
columns.sfdc_description: The ISO currency code for the conversion rate entry.

columns.name: startdate
columns.sfdc_description: The start date when the conversion rate becomes effective.

columns.name: nextstartdate
columns.sfdc_description: The start date of the next conversion rate period.

columns.name: conversionrate
columns.sfdc_description: The currency conversion rate for a specific date.

columns.name: createddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the conversion rate record was created.

columns.name: createdbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who created the dated conversion rate record.

columns.name: lastmodifieddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the conversion rate record in the datedconversionrate table was last modified.

columns.name: lastmodifiedbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who last modified the dated conversion rate record.

columns.name: systemmodstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp indicating when the conversion rate record was last modified in the system.

columns.name: recordstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the conversion rate record was created or modified.

columns.name: col
columns.sfdc_description: An array of string values associated with the dated conversion rate entries in the table.

columns.name: id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the event.

columns.name: whoid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the contact or lead associated with the event.

columns.name: whatid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the related opportunity associated with the event.

columns.name: subject
columns.sfdc_description: The subject of the event.

columns.name: location
columns.sfdc_description: The location where the event is held.

columns.name: isalldayevent
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the event is an all-day event.

columns.name: activitydatetime
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the event activity occurred.

columns.name: activitydate
columns.sfdc_description: The date of the event activity.

columns.name: durationinminutes
columns.sfdc_description: The duration of the event in minutes.

columns.name: startdatetime
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the event starts.

columns.name: enddatetime
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the event concluded.

columns.name: enddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date when the event concludes.

columns.name: description
columns.sfdc_description: A text description of the event.

columns.name: accountid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the event.

columns.name: ownerid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user or team that owns the event.

columns.name: isprivate
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the event is private.

columns.name: showas
columns.sfdc_description: The availability status indicated for the event (e.g., Busy).

columns.name: ischild
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the event is a child (subordinate) event of another event.

columns.name: isgroupevent
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the event is a group event.

columns.name: groupeventtype
columns.sfdc_description: The group event type associated with the event.

columns.name: createddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the event was created.

columns.name: createdbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who created the event.

columns.name: lastmodifieddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the event record was last modified.

columns.name: lastmodifiedbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who last modified the event.

columns.name: systemmodstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time the event record was last modified by the system.

columns.name: recurrenceactivityid
columns.sfdc_description: The ID of the recurring activity associated with the event.

columns.name: isrecurrence
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the event is a recurring (repeating) event.

columns.name: recurrencestartdatetime
columns.sfdc_description: The start date and time of the event's recurring schedule.

columns.name: recurrenceenddateonly
columns.sfdc_description: The end date (without time) of a recurring event.

columns.name: recurrencetimezonesidkey
columns.sfdc_description: The identifier key for the time zone associated with a recurring event.

columns.name: recurrencetype
columns.sfdc_description: The type of recurrence pattern associated with the event.

columns.name: recurrenceinterval
columns.sfdc_description: The time interval between repeated occurrences of the event.

columns.name: recurrencedayofweekmask
columns.sfdc_description: A bitmask representing the days of the week when the event recurs.

columns.name: recurrencedayofmonth
columns.sfdc_description: The day of the month on which the event recurs.

columns.name: recurrenceinstance
columns.sfdc_description: The identifier for the specific instance of a recurring event.

columns.name: recurrencemonthofyear
columns.sfdc_description: The month of the year in which the event recurs.

columns.name: reminderdatetime
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when a reminder for the event is scheduled.

columns.name: isreminderset
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether a reminder is set for the event.

columns.name: eventsubtype
columns.sfdc_description: The subtype classification of the event.

columns.name: isrecurrence2exclusion
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates if the event is an exclusion from a recurring event series.

columns.name: recurrence2patterntext
columns.sfdc_description: The text description of the recurrence pattern for the event.

columns.name: recurrence2patternversion
columns.sfdc_description: The version of the event's second recurrence pattern.

columns.name: isrecurrence2
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the event is a recurring event.

columns.name: isrecurrence2exception
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the event is an exception to a recurring event series.

columns.name: recurrence2patternstartdate
columns.sfdc_description: The start date and time of the recurrence pattern for a repeating event.

columns.name: recurrence2patterntimezone
columns.sfdc_description: The time zone associated with the second recurrence pattern of the event.

columns.name: recordstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the event record was created.

columns.name: currencyisocode
columns.sfdc_description: The currency ISO code associated with the event.

columns.name: who_type
columns.sfdc_description: The type of entity (e.g., lead, contact) associated with the event.

columns.name: what_type
columns.sfdc_description: The type or category of the event.

columns.name: owner_type
columns.sfdc_description: The type of owner associated with the event.

columns.name: id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for a lead in the CRM system.

columns.name: masterrecordid
columns.sfdc_description: The ID of the master lead record that this lead is associated with.

columns.name: lastname
columns.sfdc_description: The last name of the lead.

columns.name: firstname

columns.name: salutation
columns.sfdc_description: The formal greeting prefix (e.g., Mr., Ms.) associated with the lead.

columns.sfdc_description: The full name of the lead.

columns.name: recordtypeid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the type of lead record.

columns.name: title
columns.sfdc_description: The job title of the lead.

columns.name: company
columns.sfdc_description: The name of the company associated with the lead.

columns.name: street
columns.sfdc_description: The street address of the lead.

columns.name: city
columns.sfdc_description: The city associated with the lead.

columns.name: state
columns.sfdc_description: The state or city associated with the lead.

columns.name: postalcode
columns.sfdc_description: The postal code associated with the lead.

columns.name: country
columns.sfdc_description: The country associated with the lead.

columns.name: latitude
columns.sfdc_description: The geographic latitude coordinate of the lead's location.

columns.name: longitude
columns.sfdc_description: The geographic longitude coordinate associated with the lead.

columns.name: geocodeaccuracy
columns.sfdc_description: The level of precision of the geocoded location for the lead.

columns.name: phone
columns.sfdc_description: The phone number associated with the lead.

columns.name: email
columns.sfdc_description: The email address associated with the lead.

columns.name: website
columns.sfdc_description: The website URL of the lead.

columns.name: photourl
columns.sfdc_description: The URL path to the lead's photo.

columns.name: description
columns.sfdc_description: The additional notes or details about the lead.

columns.name: leadsource
columns.sfdc_description: The source from which the lead was acquired.

columns.name: status
columns.sfdc_description: The current status of the lead (e.g., New, Qualified).

columns.name: industry
columns.sfdc_description: The industry sector associated with the lead.

columns.name: rating
columns.sfdc_description: The assessment of the lead's potential or quality.

columns.name: annualrevenue
columns.sfdc_description: The annual revenue associated with the lead.

columns.name: numberofemployees
columns.sfdc_description: The number of employees associated with the lead.

columns.name: ownerid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user responsible for the lead.

columns.name: isconverted

columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who created the lead.

columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who last modified the lead.

columns.name: individualid

columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the lead record was created or last updated.

columns.name: ispriorityrecord

columns.name: owner_type
columns.sfdc_description: The type of owner associated with the lead.

columns.name: id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for an opportunity.

columns.name: accountid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the opportunity.

columns.name: recordtypeid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the opportunity record type.

columns.name: name

columns.name: description
columns.sfdc_description: A text description providing details about the sales opportunity.

columns.name: stagename
columns.sfdc_description: The current stage of the sales opportunity.

columns.name: amount
columns.sfdc_description: The total potential monetary value of the sales opportunity.

columns.name: probability
columns.sfdc_description: The probability that the opportunity will be won.

columns.name: closedate
columns.sfdc_description: The date when the opportunity was closed.

columns.name: type
columns.sfdc_description: The type or category of the sales opportunity.

columns.name: nextstep
columns.sfdc_description: The next action or step needed to progress the opportunity.

columns.name: leadsource
columns.sfdc_description: The source of the lead that generated the opportunity.

columns.name: isclosed
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the opportunity has been closed.

columns.name: iswon
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the opportunity has been won.

columns.name: forecastcategory
columns.sfdc_description: The category representing the opportunity's status in the sales forecast process.

columns.name: forecastcategoryname
columns.sfdc_description: The category assigned to the opportunity for sales forecasting purposes.

columns.name: campaignid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the marketing campaign associated with the opportunity.

columns.name: hasopportunitylineitem
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the opportunity has one or more associated opportunity line items.

columns.name: pricebook2id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the price book associated with the opportunity.

columns.name: ownerid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who owns the opportunity.

columns.name: createddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the opportunity record was created.

columns.name: createdbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who created the opportunity.

columns.name: lastmodifieddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp indicating when the opportunity record was last modified.

columns.name: lastmodifiedbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who last modified the opportunity record.

columns.name: systemmodstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the opportunity record was last modified.

columns.name: lastactivitydate
columns.sfdc_description: The date of the most recent activity associated with the opportunity.

columns.name: laststagechangedate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the opportunity's stage was last changed.

columns.name: fiscalquarter
columns.sfdc_description: The fiscal quarter of the opportunity's close date.

columns.name: fiscalyear
columns.sfdc_description: The fiscal year associated with the opportunity.

columns.name: fiscal
columns.sfdc_description: The fiscal year and period associated with the opportunity.

columns.name: contactid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the contact associated with the opportunity.

columns.name: lastvieweddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time the opportunity record was last viewed.

columns.name: lastreferenceddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the opportunity was last referenced.

columns.name: hasopenactivity
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the opportunity has any open activities.

columns.name: hasoverduetask
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates if the opportunity has at least one overdue task.

columns.name: lastamountchangedhistoryid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the history record tracking the last change to the opportunity's amount.

columns.name: lastclosedatechangedhistoryid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the history record tracking the last change to the opportunity's close date.

columns.name: recordstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The creation or update timestamp of the opportunity record.

columns.name: currencyisocode
columns.sfdc_description: The ISO currency code for the opportunity.

columns.name: pushcount
columns.sfdc_description: The number of times the opportunity's close date has been pushed (rescheduled).

columns.name: id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the opportunity history record.

columns.name: opportunityid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the opportunity associated with the history entry.

columns.name: createdbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who created the opportunity history record.

columns.name: createddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the opportunity history record was created.

columns.name: stagename
columns.sfdc_description: The stage name of the opportunity in this history entry.

columns.name: amount
columns.sfdc_description: The monetary value of the opportunity at a specific point in its history.

columns.name: expectedrevenue
columns.sfdc_description: The expected revenue amount for an opportunity as recorded at a specific point in its history.

columns.name: closedate
columns.sfdc_description: The date when the opportunity was closed.

columns.name: probability
columns.sfdc_description: The decimal probability that the opportunity would be won at the time of the history entry.

columns.name: forecastcategory
columns.sfdc_description: The category indicating the opportunity's stage within the sales forecasting process.

columns.name: currencyisocode
columns.sfdc_description: The ISO currency code associated with the opportunity history record.

columns.name: systemmodstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the system recorded a change to the opportunity.

columns.name: isdeleted
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the opportunity history record has been deleted.

columns.name: prevamount
columns.sfdc_description: The previous amount of the opportunity prior to a change recorded in the opportunity history.

columns.name: prevclosedate
columns.sfdc_description: The previous close date of the opportunity prior to the current history entry.

columns.name: id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for a record type in the CRM system.

columns.name: name
columns.sfdc_description: The descriptive name of the record type.

columns.name: developername
columns.sfdc_description: The developer-assigned name identifying the type of record in the CRM.

columns.name: namespaceprefix
columns.sfdc_description: The namespace prefix indicating the source package of the record type.

columns.name: description
columns.sfdc_description: A description of the purpose or use case for the associated record type.

columns.name: businessprocessid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the business process associated with the record type.

columns.name: sobjecttype
columns.sfdc_description: The Salesforce object type associated with the record type.

columns.name: isactive
columns.sfdc_description: The active status of the record type.

columns.name: createdbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who created the record type.

columns.name: createddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the record type entry was created.

columns.name: lastmodifiedbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who last modified the record type.

columns.name: lastmodifieddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when a record type entry was last modified.

columns.name: systemmodstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the record type was last modified in the system.

columns.name: recordstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp representing when the record type was created or last modified.

columns.name: id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the task.

columns.name: whoid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the person (e.g., lead or contact) associated with the task.

columns.name: whatid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the related record associated with the task.

columns.name: subject
columns.sfdc_description: The subject of the task.

columns.name: activitydate
columns.sfdc_description: The date of the task activity.

columns.name: status
columns.sfdc_description: The current status of the task (e.g., Not Started, In Progress).

columns.name: priority
columns.sfdc_description: The priority level assigned to the task.

columns.name: ishighpriority
columns.sfdc_description: The high priority status of the task.

columns.name: ownerid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who owns the task.

columns.name: description
columns.sfdc_description: The textual description of the task.

columns.name: accountid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the task.

columns.name: isclosed
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the task has been closed.

columns.name: createddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the task was created.

columns.name: createdbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who created the task.

columns.name: lastmodifieddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the task was last modified.

columns.name: lastmodifiedbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who last modified the task.

columns.name: systemmodstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp of when the task record was last modified by the system.

columns.name: calldurationinseconds
columns.sfdc_description: The call duration of the task, measured in seconds.

columns.name: calltype
columns.sfdc_description: The type of call associated with the task.

columns.name: calldisposition
columns.sfdc_description: The outcome of the call associated with the task.

columns.name: callobject
columns.sfdc_description: The object or subject of the call associated with the task.

columns.name: reminderdatetime
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time a reminder is scheduled for the task.

columns.name: isreminderset
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether a reminder is set for the task.

columns.name: recurrenceactivityid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the recurring activity associated with the task.

columns.name: isrecurrence
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates if the task is recurring.

columns.name: recurrencestartdateonly
columns.sfdc_description: The start date (without a time component) for a recurring task.

columns.name: recurrenceenddateonly
columns.sfdc_description: The date on which a recurring task's recurrence ends, excluding time information.

columns.name: recurrencetimezonesidkey
columns.sfdc_description: The key linking to the timezone associated with a task's recurrence schedule.

columns.name: recurrencetype
columns.sfdc_description: The recurrence type for the task.

columns.name: recurrenceinterval
columns.sfdc_description: The time interval between recurring instances of the task.

columns.name: recurrencedayofweekmask
columns.sfdc_description: A bitmask representing the days of the week on which the task recurs.

columns.name: recurrencedayofmonth
columns.sfdc_description: The day of the month on which a recurring task is scheduled to occur.

columns.name: recurrenceinstance
columns.sfdc_description: The identifier for a specific instance of a recurring task.

columns.name: recurrencemonthofyear
columns.sfdc_description: The month of the year when the task recurs.

columns.name: recurrenceregeneratedtype
columns.sfdc_description: The type of recurrence regeneration associated with a task.

columns.name: tasksubtype
columns.sfdc_description: The subtype classification of the task.

columns.name: completeddatetime
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the task was completed.

columns.name: recordstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp of the task record's creation or last update.

columns.name: currencyisocode
columns.sfdc_description: The ISO currency code of the task.

columns.name: who_type
columns.sfdc_description: The type of entity associated with the task.

columns.name: what_type
columns.sfdc_description: The type of task indicating it relates to an opportunity.

columns.name: owner_type
columns.sfdc_description: The type of owner of the task.

columns.name: id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for each user in the CRM system.

columns.name: username
columns.sfdc_description: The email-formatted username assigned to each user.

columns.name: lastname
columns.sfdc_description: The last name of the user.

columns.name: firstname
columns.sfdc_description: The given first name of the user.

columns.name: name
columns.sfdc_description: The role or name assigned to the user in the CRM system.

columns.name: companyname
columns.sfdc_description: The name of the company associated with the user.

columns.name: division
columns.sfdc_description: The organizational division the user is associated with.

columns.name: department
columns.sfdc_description: The department within the organization that the user is associated with.

columns.name: title
columns.sfdc_description: The honorific title associated with the user.

columns.name: street
columns.sfdc_description: The street address of the user.

columns.name: city
columns.sfdc_description: The city where the user is located.

columns.name: state
columns.sfdc_description: The state or province associated with the user's address.

columns.name: postalcode
columns.sfdc_description: The postal code associated with the user.

columns.name: country
columns.sfdc_description: The country associated with the user.

columns.name: latitude
columns.sfdc_description: The geographic latitude coordinate associated with the user's location.

columns.name: longitude
columns.sfdc_description: The geographic longitude coordinate associated with the user.

columns.name: geocodeaccuracy
columns.sfdc_description: The accuracy level of the user's geocoded location data.

columns.name: email
columns.sfdc_description: The email address of a user, typically reflecting their role or function at unicorn.com.unilc.

columns.name: emailpreferencesautobcc
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the user has enabled automatic BCC in their email preferences.

columns.name: senderemail
columns.sfdc_description: The sender email address associated with the user.

columns.name: sendername
columns.sfdc_description: The sender name associated with the user for outgoing communications.

columns.name: signature
columns.sfdc_description: The user's personalized signature for communications.

columns.name: phone
columns.sfdc_description: The phone number of the user.

columns.name: fax
columns.sfdc_description: The fax number associated with the user.

columns.name: mobilephone
columns.sfdc_description: The mobile phone number associated with the user.

columns.name: alias
columns.sfdc_description: The alternative name or nickname used to identify a user.

columns.name: communitynickname
columns.sfdc_description: The user's community nickname, which may be a descriptive label or an automated name with a prefix and timestamp.

columns.name: badgetext
columns.sfdc_description: The text associated with the user's badge.

columns.name: isactive
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the user account is currently active.

columns.name: timezonesidkey
columns.sfdc_description: The IANA time zone identifier associated with the user.

columns.name: userroleid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the role assigned to the user.

columns.name: localesidkey
columns.sfdc_description: The locale identifier (language and region) associated with the user.

columns.name: emailencodingkey
columns.sfdc_description: The character encoding used for the user's email.

columns.name: profileid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user's profile.

columns.name: usertype
columns.sfdc_description: The type or category of the user in the CRM system.

columns.name: languagelocalekey
columns.sfdc_description: The language and region locale key associated with the user.

columns.name: employeenumber
columns.sfdc_description: The employee identification number associated with the user.

columns.name: delegatedapproverid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the delegated approver for this user.

columns.name: managerid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user's manager.

columns.name: lastlogindate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the user last logged into the system.

columns.name: createddate
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

columns.name: createdbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The user record creator's unique ID.

columns.name: lastmodifieddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time when the user's record was last modified.

columns.name: lastmodifiedbyid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the user who last modified the user record.

columns.name: systemmodstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the user record was last modified in the system.

columns.name: forecastenabled
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the user has forecasting functionality enabled.

columns.name: contactid
columns.sfdc_description: The identifier for the contact associated with the user.

columns.name: accountid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the account linked to the user.

columns.name: callcenterid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier of the call center associated with the user.

columns.name: extension
columns.sfdc_description: The phone extension associated with the user.

columns.name: federationidentifier
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the user in a federated identity system (e.g., single sign-on).

columns.name: aboutme
columns.sfdc_description: A user's self-provided biography or descriptive text, which may be empty.

columns.name: fullphotourl
columns.sfdc_description: The URL of the user's profile photo.

columns.name: smallphotourl
columns.sfdc_description: The URL of the small-sized profile photo for the user.

columns.name: mediumphotourl
columns.sfdc_description: The URL of the user's medium-sized profile photo, or an empty string if no medium photo is available.

columns.name: digestfrequency
columns.sfdc_description: The user's preferred frequency for receiving a digest communication.

columns.name: defaultgroupnotificationfrequency
columns.sfdc_description: The default group notification frequency for the user.

columns.name: lastvieweddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time of the user's last view action.

columns.name: lastreferenceddate
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time the user was last referenced in the system.

columns.name: bannerphotourl
columns.sfdc_description: The URL for the user's banner photo.

columns.name: smallbannerphotourl
columns.sfdc_description: The file path to the user's small banner photo.

columns.name: mediumbannerphotourl
columns.sfdc_description: The URL path to the medium-sized banner photo associated with the user.

columns.name: isprofilephotoactive
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether a user's profile photo is active.

columns.name: individualid
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the individual associated with the user account.

columns.name: recordstamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the user record was created or last modified.

columns.name: emailpreferencesautobccstayintouch

columns.sfdc_description: The ISO currency code associated with the user.

columns.name: userpermissionssupportuser

columns.name: userpreferencesfavoriteswtshown
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the user's favorite Wt preferences are shown.

columns.name: userpreferencesrecordhomesectioncollapsewtshown
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the user prefers the record home section to collapse when shown.

columns.name: userpreferencesrecordhomereservedwtshown
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the user prefers to show the reserved status on their home record.

columns.name: userpreferencesfavoritesshowtopfavorites
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the user's favorites preferences include showing their top favorites.

columns.name: userpreferencesexcludemailappattachments
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the user prefers to exclude mail app attachments.

columns.name: userpreferencessuppresstasksfxreminders
columns.sfdc_description: The user's preference to suppress task reminders.

columns.name: userpreferencessuppresseventsfxreminders
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates if the user suppresses event and FX reminders in their preferences.

columns.name: userpreferencespreviewcustomtheme
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the user has enabled the preview custom theme setting in their preferences.

columns.name: userpreferenceshascelebrationbadge
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the user's preferences include a celebration badge.

columns.name: userpreferencesuserdebugmodepref
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the user has enabled debug mode in their preferences.

columns.name: userpreferencessrhoverrideactivities
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether a user's preferences override SR hover activities.

columns.name: userpreferencesnewlightningreportrunpageenabled
columns.sfdc_description: Whether the user has enabled the new Lightning report run page in their preferences.

columns.name: userpreferencesreverseopenactivitiesview
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the user prefers to reverse the view of open activities.

columns.name: userpreferenceshassentwarningemail
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether a warning email has been sent to the user about their preferences.

columns.name: userpreferenceshassentwarningemail238
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether warning email 238 has been sent to the user.

columns.name: userpreferenceshassentwarningemail240
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether a 240 warning email has been sent to the user.

columns.name: userpreferenceshidebrowseproductredirectconfirmation
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates if a user prefers to hide the browse product redirect confirmation prompt.

columns.name: userpreferenceshideonlinesalesappwelcomemat
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether a user prefers to hide the welcome mat in the online sales app.

columns.name: userpreferencesshowforecastingroundedamounts
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether a user prefers to show rounded amounts in forecasting.

columns.name: isextindicatorvisible
columns.sfdc_description: Indicates whether the external indicator is visible for the user.

columns.name: outofofficemessage
columns.sfdc_description: The out-of-office message set by the user.

columns.name: user_id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the user associated with the event.

columns.name: event_type
columns.sfdc_description: The type of user event.

columns.name: event_timestamp
columns.sfdc_description: The timestamp when the user event occurred.

columns.name: event_payload
columns.sfdc_description: A JSON string containing user event details including product ID, price, client IP, and session ID.

columns.name: dt
columns.sfdc_description: The date when the user event occurred.

columns.name: tm
columns.sfdc_description: The time (in 24-hour HHMM format) associated with the user event.

columns.name: user_id
columns.sfdc_description: The unique identifier for the user associated with the event.

columns.name: event_type
columns.sfdc_description: The type of user event, such as click or purchase.

columns.name: event_timestamp
columns.sfdc_description: The date and time at which a user event occurred.

columns.name: event_payload
columns.sfdc_description: A JSON-formatted string containing details of a user event, including product ID, price, client IP address, and session ID.

columns.name: dt
columns.sfdc_description: The date on which the user event occurred.

columns.name: tm
columns.sfdc_description: The 24-hour time (e.g., 1400 for 2:00 PM) when the user event occurred.
